Blog.post: Those Memegens are so funny don't you think? I am still going to try and find some more! There is ton to choose from and i will get more that are more entertaining and funny! Hopefully they tell the truth too! Don't you hate when it is nothing close to you? Hhahah...I don't really care..I just like to see if they work! Hope you all don't get sicked out by the orgasm one but have a laugh at it!! Okay thanks a lot and hope you have fun!

Hey everyone! Help with my yahoo group.... To subscribe it is: WA_bball_is_da_bomb-subscribe@yahoogroups.com Unsubscribe: WA_bball_is_da_bomb-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com List owner: WA_bball_is_da_bomb-owner@yahoogroups.com Post message: WA_bball_is_da_bomb@yahoogroups.com

I told you this is where all your dreams come true so go ahead and try!!! Well hey welcome to my blog and have some fun if you dare! hahaha....no this isn't condemned site or anything i am just messed up! well try not to be too bored with this place!

Have any of you seen the movie Eurotrip? If you have then you know it is a sick but funny as hell movie! We just got the movie on Sunday, and i watched it! The best part is when the main guy Scotty graduates and his g/f Fionna dumps him that day! He then goes to a party and the band sings a awesome song! "Scotty doesnt know, scotty doesnt know! We do it in my van every sunday!" Awesome movie..i will tell you more later!

If any of you have seen the movie Slackers then you know what I am talking about. I know you may be wondering why I am writing about this subject but my friend was doing some impressions of it so it just was something I thought I should write about. Now remember when the weirdo kid sings "You have the key to my little locked room" That cracks me up just thinking about it. My friend Bido can do that impression really good. Also when he makes the hair doll out of a girls hair that he likes. " But it fell out of your hair that way" Funny and gross at the same time. Well if none of you have seen it then you need to rent it. It has some disgusting parts but if you get to the funny parts you'll start rolling on the floor.

School is almost over with!! We have 5 1/2 days left till the SUMMER!!! YAHOO! This is were finals come though and big projects are due! Then we get to see how bad were doing when we get our report cards!! ahah... Well people are all about getting their yearbooks signed by people, and trying to get the boy they have always wanted for the summer...haha..maybe for some people. *cough* *cough*.haha.. The seniors had their famous signing day..where they chase after you if your run away and sign you with permanent markers that take forever to get off! It is cool though. Time for hanging out a lot with the friends, and then Fair-that is the best! SO GLAD SCHOOL IS ALMOST OVER WITH! I BET HALF OF THE PEOPLE IN THE UNITED STATES ARE OUT OF SCHOOL THOUGH! YOU GUYS SUCK IF YOU ARE!!AHAAH...HAHA....J/K

Well I think we have a pretty mean girl in our school..One of my friends moved away to another school and was going out with a guy from our school. They broke up and then this pass around hoe carissa had to come and think she was all that and go after him. The only real reason why they are going out is because they know that they can both get the $ex that they have always wanted. She is always talking too about how she can't wait for the summer to have $eX. Know how mean is that to do that to the friend Millie(nickname) who was just trying to get over the stupid bastard Jimmy? I mean she still liked him too...but now that is over with and their going out (carissa and jimmy) millie decided that's it for both of them and won't probably like them ever again...or maybe...so it was chaotic!

Well, today is really boring! School sucks the big one! Especially the 1st class that we have..the teacher is condemned!!ahahaa..To start it off too she had Mt. Dew, which if you all know that is not the best thing for everyone. She is already crazed so that just made it worse! SO ya then she hits on all the guys in our class too which is just disgusting!! Her laugh is so funny but yet scary...if any of you have watched SpongeBob SquarePants and heard Mr. Krabs laugh that is her laugh!! Well, i could say much more about her but she is right close by and dont have much more time to type! Thanks for tuning in!
